name: Vogoth

skills.name: Horrendous Strength
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of increasing the duration of 1 random debuff on the target by 1 turn.

effects.notes: 3 hits total, 0.07 HP multiplier per hit. Extremely low damage - focus is debuff extension, not damage output.
Each hit has 30% chance (40% when fully booked) to extend 1 random debuff duration by 1 turn. SYNERGY: Pairs with Poison/Decrease ATK/DEF/Weaken champions for Clan Boss. Works on ALL debuffs.

skills.book_value: LOW PRIORITY. Damage +15% total, debuff chance +10% (30% → 40%). Books only marginally improve debuff extension chance. A2 and Passive are higher priorities.
skills.notes: SYNERGY SKILL. Multi-hit + debuff extension makes Vogoth excellent for Clan Boss when paired with Poison (Frozen Banshee), Decrease ATK/DEF (Rhazin), Weaken champions. Also synergizes with Giant Slayer mastery (3 hits = 3 proc chances). Low damage is intentional - Vogoth is support/tank, not damage dealer.

skills.name: Wave of Revulsion
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 60% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn. Also has a 60% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns on targets who receive [Provoke] debuff from this skill.

effects.notes: AOE attack, 0.2 HP multiplier. Minimal damage - skill's value is in debuff application.
60% chance (75% when fully booked) to place Provoke debuff on ALL enemies for 1 turn. Forces enemies to target Vogoth. Requires ACC to land.

60% chance (75% when fully booked) to place 50% Decrease ATK for 2 turns ONLY on targets who received Provoke. Two-stage RNG: Provoke must land FIRST, then Decrease ATK has separate 60% check. CRITICAL for survivability in Clan Boss, Doom Tower, Arena Defense.

skills.book_value: HIGH PRIORITY. Cooldown -1 (4 → 3 turns) is CRITICAL for consistent uptime. Debuff chance +15% total (60% → 75%). Essential for Bommal and CB survivability.
skills.notes: CORE DEFENSIVE SKILL. Provoke forces enemies to attack Vogoth, synergizing with his passive healing (Festering Dynamo heals allies when Vogoth is hit). Decrease ATK reduces incoming damage by 50%. Two-stage proc: Provoke must land before Decrease ATK can apply. BOMMAL SYNERGY: Provoke + Decrease ATK reduces Bommal damage significantly. Book to 3-turn CD for consistent protection.

skills.name: Festering Dynamo (Passive)
skills.description: Whenever this Champion is attacked, heals all allies by 50% of the damage received. Only heals by 25% of the damage received from boss attacks. This champion only receives half of the heal that all other allies receive.

effects.notes: Heals all allies for 50% of damage Vogoth receives from non-boss attacks. BOSS MECHANIC: Only 25% heal from boss attacks. Vogoth receives 50% of the heal allies get (so if allies heal 1000, Vogoth heals 500).
BOSS ATTACK HEAL: Only 25% of damage received from boss attacks heals allies (half of normal 50%). IMPORTANT: Dreadbombs are classified as ENEMIES (not bosses), so they trigger 50% heal.

skills.notes: GOD-TIER PASSIVE for Bommal Dreadhorn. Dreadbombs are ENEMIES (not bosses), triggering full 50% healing. Positioning matters: place Vogoth LAST in team for maximum AOE healing (enemies attack left-to-right). Synergizes with Provoke (A2) forcing enemies to attack Vogoth. Enables LIFESTEAL removal from team (allies heal from Vogoth's passive instead). Community tested: Guardian gear set does NOT stack with this passive. Pairs with Geomancer (Burn reflection + healing combo).

skills.name: Eerie Presence (Passive)
skills.description: When attacked, places a Leech debuff on the attacker for 2 turns. If the attacker is under a Provoke debuff placed by this Champion, also has a 70% chance of increasing the cooldown of a random skill on the attacker by 2 turns. Occurs once per attack.

effects.notes: Automatically places Leech debuff on attacker for 2 turns. NO ACC CHECK NEEDED per tooltip (but community reports ACC still required - validate in testing). Leech heals attacker's allies based on damage dealt.

CONDITIONAL: If attacker is under Vogoth's Provoke debuff, 70% chance (100% when fully booked) to increase random skill cooldown by 2 turns. Requires books for +30% chance. SYNERGY: Pair with A2 Wave of Revulsion (Provoke) for consistent cooldown disruption.

skills.book_value: MEDIUM PRIORITY. Books add +30% cooldown increase chance (70% → 100%). Essential for PVP and Bommal control. 4 books total.
skills.notes: DUAL-PURPOSE PASSIVE. Leech applies automatically when attacked (no Provoke needed). Cooldown increase ONLY triggers if attacker under Vogoth's Provoke. BOMMAL SYNERGY: Provoke from A2 + cooldown increase disrupts Bombal's ability rotation. ARENA: Strong defensive passive against speed teams. Books recommended for 100% cooldown increase chance.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: Double Vogoth Dreadhorn cheese, Geomancer synergy, Lifesteal removal enabler
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: DOUBLE VOGOTH DREADHORN: Run 2 Vogoth to heal each other + team (positioning critical, both LAST slots). Community-validated cheese for Dreadhorn Hard. GEOMANCER SYNERGY: Provoke forces enemies to attack Vogoth → Geomancer Burn reflection → Vogoth heals team from damage received. LIFESTEAL REMOVAL: Vogoth's passive healing replaces Lifesteal gear for entire team (gear flexibility). POSITIONING: Last slot maximizes AOE healing (enemies attack left-to-right).

mechanics_advisory: GOD-TIER BOMMAL HEALER. Dreadbombs classified as ENEMIES (not bosses), triggering full 50% healing per hit. Positioning LAST slot critical for max AOE healing. Provoke (A2) + Decrease ATK synergizes with passive healing (forces enemies to attack Vogoth with reduced damage). Leech passive (A4) triggers automatically when attacked. LIFESTEAL ENABLER: Team doesn't need Lifesteal gear (Vogoth heals allies). Pairs with Geomancer (Burn reflection + healing combo), Frozen Banshee (Poison extension A1), Rhazin (Decrease DEF/Weaken extension). Guardian set does NOT work/stack with passive (community tested). Book priority: A2 for Provoke uptime (HIGH), A4 for cooldown increase (MEDIUM), A1 for marginal debuff chance (LOW). Affinity-friendly CB solution (Spirit affinity neutral to most affinities). IRON TWINS: Strong choice for debuff extension + survivability.
